group-poll-interval.help: Interval in minutes within to fetch groups from FSSO server, or unset to disable.
group-poll-interval.name: group-poll-interval

ldap-poll.help: Enable/disable automatic fetching of groups from LDAP server.
ldap-poll.name: ldap-poll

options.help: Enable automatic fetching of groups from LDAP server.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable automatic fetching of groups from LDAP server.
options.name: disable

ldap-poll-interval.help: Interval in minutes within to fetch groups from LDAP server.
ldap-poll-interval.name: ldap-poll-interval

ldap-server.help: LDAP server to get group information.
ldap-server.name: ldap-server

password.help: Password of the first FSSO collector agent.
password.name: password

password2.help: Password of the second FSSO collector agent.
password2.name: password2

password3.help: Password of the third FSSO collector agent.
password3.name: password3

password4.help: Password of the fourth FSSO collector agent.
password4.name: password4

password5.help: Password of the fifth FSSO collector agent.
password5.name: password5

port.help: Port of the first FSSO collector agent.
port.name: port

port2.help: Port of the second FSSO collector agent.
port2.name: port2

port3.help: Port of the third FSSO collector agent.
port3.name: port3

port4.help: Port of the fourth FSSO collector agent.
port4.name: port4

port5.help: Port of the fifth FSSO collector agent.
port5.name: port5

server.help: Domain name or IP address of the first FSSO collector agent.
server.name: server

server2.help: Domain name or IP address of the second FSSO collector agent.
server2.name: server2

server3.help: Domain name or IP address of the third FSSO collector agent.
server3.name: server3

server4.help: Domain name or IP address of the fourth FSSO collector agent.
server4.name: server4

server5.help: Domain name or IP address of the fifth FSSO collector agent.
server5.name: server5

source-ip.help: Source IP for communications to FSSO agent.
source-ip.name: source-ip

source-ip6.help: IPv6 source for communications to FSSO agent.
source-ip6.name: source-ip6

ssl-trusted-cert.help: Trusted server certificate or CA certificate.
ssl-trusted-cert.name: ssl-trusted-cert

options.help: All other unspecified types of servers.
options.name: default

user-info-server.help: LDAP server to get user information.
user-info-server.name: user-info-server

results.help: Configure Fortinet Single Sign On (FSSO) agents.
results.name: fsso
